title: Bug 121524Border is still displayed in the layout after delete the style
description: Description:Border is still displayed in the layout after delete the styleSteps to reproduce:1.New a style with background color: yellow, border{solid,red,10pixels}2.Add a table and apply the style to the table (see the attachement)3.Delete the styleExpected result:All style disappearActual result:Border is still displayed in the layout,while other style disappear. In preview, border is not there.
